en-US.error_sending_message: An error occurred while sending the message:
en-US.error_player_not_found_content: No player with the provided tag was found. Please provide a valid tag.
en-US.error_not_in_clan_title: You are not in a clan.
en-US.error_server_already_paired_content: This server is already connected to clan: #
en-US.error_unexpected_content: An unexpected error occurred. Please report it to the bot owner.
en-US.error_maintenance_content:
Clash of Clans is undergoing technical maintenance. Please try again later.
Reason for maintenance:
en-US.error_api_limit_exceeded_content: The API limit for Clash of Clans has been exceeded. Please try again later.
en-US.error_clan_not_found_content: No clan with the provided tag was found. Please provide a valid tag.
en-US.error_not_verified_content: An error occurred while assigning rank and changing nickname.
en-US.error_guild_not_set_content: Discord server is not paired with the CLASH clan, therefore verification is not possible.
en-US.error_guild_role_not_set_content: The Discord server does not have verification roles set, making verification impossible.
en-US.error_incorrect_data_verify_content: The Token or Tag is incorrect.
en-US.error_account_paired_content: Your Discord account is already paired with this CLASH account in this clan.
en-US.error_account_paired_content2:
Your Discord account is already paired with a CLASH account.
Paired CLASH account:
en-US.error_account_paired_content3: An account with this CLASH tag is already paired!
en-US.error_selecting_rank: An error occurred while selecting the game rank.
en-US.error_selecting_commands: An error occurred while selecting the command.
en-US.error_giving_rank: An error occurred while assigning rank.
en-US.error_account_unpared_content: Your account is not paired, so unpairing failed.
en-US.error_guild_unpared_content: The server is not paired, so it cannot be unpaired.
en-US.error_permissions_content: The bot did not receive all the required permissions for proper functioning.
en-US.error_permissions_role: The bot's role must be above the roles it manages.
en-US.error_inccorect_role_content: An error occurred with the set discord roles, possibly one of the set ranks was deleted.
en-US.error_can_not_add_this_role_content: Roles like %s, %s, or %s cannot be assigned.
en-US.error_permissions_nick: An error occurred while changing the nickname (insufficient permissions). It's likely that the player has a higher role than the bot, preventing nickname changes. To fix this, the bot's role must be above other roles.
en-US.error_ranks_managed: At least one of the set ranks is managed remotely.
en-US.success_ranks_priority: The rank of the bot is above the roles it manages.
en-US.success_permissions_content: The bot has all the required permissions.
en-US.success_paired_clan_content: This Discord server has been paired with the Clash clan.
en-US.success_account_verified_content: Account and guild membership have been confirmed. Your data has been saved and a rank assigned.
en-US.success_guild_updated_content: The guild in your account has been successfully updated.
en-US.success_guild_unpared_content: Successfully unpaired the Clash server from DC. All paired players have been unpaired from the guild.
en-US.success_account_unpared_content: Successfully unpaired the DC account from the CLASH account.
en-US.warn_ranks_priority: The bot's rank is not at the top, if the player has a higher rank than the bot, the bot will not be able to manage him.
en-US.command_debug_description: Checking that the clan is configured correctly and roles are synchronized.
en-US.command_configure_description: Configure the bot on the server.
en-US.command_configure_pair_description: Pair the server with the CLASH clan.
en-US.command_configure_unpair_description: Unpair the server from the CLASH clan.
en-US.command_configure_role_description: Assign Clash of Clans role to Discord role.
en-US.command_configure_role_rank_description: Rank in the Clash of Clans clan.
en-US.command_configure_role_rola_description: Role corresponding to the clan rank.
en-US.command_settings_level_description: If in-game nicknames are enabled, show game level next to nickname.
en-US.command_settings_nick_description: Change Discord nicknames to game nicknames.
en-US.command_configure_pair_tag_clan_descript: Tag of the clan in COC.
en-US.command_info_description: Bot information, mini FAQ, and current settings.
en-US.command_info_content_to_pair_acc: To pair your DC account with CLASH:
en-US.command_info_content_setrank: To set ranks in the clan, write:
en-US.command_info_content_tag_verify_location: Where to get the **TAG** for verification?
In the game, click the blue icon with your level in the top left corner, then go to the profile tab and copy the code below your nickname. In my case, it is %s.
en-US.command_info_content_token_verify_locati: Go to settings (gear icon in the bottom right corner).
en-US.command_info_content_tag_clan_verify_loc: In the game, expand the clan chat and click the clan name at the top. Under the clan name, you will see the code, which you need to copy.
en-US.command_info_content_safe_desc: The bot uses the Clash of Clans API, and all requests are sent via HTTPS (certificate). The only information currently stored is your Discord ID and the Clash tag, used to link both accounts. Both of these pieces of information are publicly accessible and can be obtained without any issues.
en-US.command_info_content_safe_token_desc: The token is one-time-use and generates a new one after each use (you can check this yourself). It is used solely for verification purposes and cannot be used for anything else.
en-US.command_info_content_summary: In conclusion, there's nothing to be afraid of!
en-US.COMMENT_HELP:: This is a comment for potential translators. Properties with the 'clash' prefix are game text, so you should translate them directly from the game. If Clash does not support your language, leave them in English.
